extendedInfo.description: Easy Voice Recorder is a fun, simple and easy to use audio & voice recorder. Use it to reliably record your meetings, personal notes, classes, and more, with no time limits!Please note that Easy Voice Recorder cannot record phone calls on most phones, and may not be compatible with all devices. For more information, please see the help ( http://www.digipom.com/easy-voice-recorder-help/ ). If there are any problems, please contact us and we can troubleshoot the problem together.Main featuresâ Record to high-quality PCM and AAC, or use AMR to save space.â Share and manage your recordings easily, and back them up to your PC.â Record in the background and control the recorder with a home screen widget.You can also use powerful Jelly Bean audio filters on supported devices, rename and delete your recordings, save them as a ringtone, integrate with Tasker and Locale, and much more.Pro featuresThe pro version offers additional power and control. Here are just some of the additional features, available on supported devices:â Record in stereo.â Record with a Bluetooth microphone.â Boost input volume with microphone software gain.â Skip silent parts.â Manage and organize your recordings with folders, and save recordings to your SD card.â Switch to the camcorder microphone for louder and clearer recordings.â Control the recorder from anywhere using the status bar. Recordings can also be pinned to the status bar.With many more enhancements and additions, and more to come in the future.Additional InfoIf you would like to help translate Easy Voice Recorder into your language, we would love to see you over at the translation project ( http://crowdin.net/project/easy-voice-recorder ). We also have a test group for alpha and beta testers ( https://groups.google.com/forum/?fromgroups#!forum/easy-voice-recorder-testing ).SupportPlease test using the free version before upgrading to pro. If there are any problems, please contact us and we can troubleshoot the problem together.Please note that Easy Voice Recorder cannot record phone calls on most phones. Some devices have known issues or may be incompatible, and recording quality varies between devices. If the app force-closes after an install or upgrade, your firmware may have corrupted the install. Please uninstall and reinstall if this happens.For more information, please see the help ( http://www.digipom.com/easy-voice-recorder-help/ ).Permission detailsRecord audio - Record audio from your microphone.Bluetooth, modify audio settings, sticky broadcasts - Support Bluetooth.Modify system settings - Support ringtones.Write to external storage - Save recordings to your external storage.Prevent phone from sleeping - Allow recordings to continue even with the screen turned off.Network access - Required by Google AdMob and other advertising platforms.Network state - Detect if there is an Internet connection available before trying to retrieve an ad.

reviews.title: Very useful !!
reviews.comment: One excellent app with a thousand uses!  Totally versatile. Works very smoothly also.  No glitches at all.  I love it !
reviews.author: Dave Gutkowski

reviews.title: Playback sound sucks
reviews.comment: There\'s a sceetching noise in the background of my recordings.  I installed this because it allowed me to forward recordings to others in mp3 format bit the sound is awful on the LG Viper
reviews.author: Tim Anderson

reviews.title: Just what I needed!
reviews.comment: This is so awesome! I\'ve been looking for an app that would record even while my phone is playing something else! Now I can do covers for my favorite songs. Thank you so much!
reviews.author: Sonali Nahata

reviews.title: Easy and fast
reviews.comment: Love using this via the widget. Just hit record for no fuss, descreet, background recording, even with the screen off. Then hit stop and it saves automatically, w/o the need to open the app at all.
reviews.author: Richard Groves

reviews.title: Really easy to use
reviews.comment: I like big buttons that can be pressed without looking at it. I also like that after stopping to record you can start another recording. The blue color is not immediately seen as a recorder if you don\'t want people to know.
reviews.author: Edward Chipeta

reviews.title: Best all around sound recorder!
reviews.comment: I love this app! It has great quality when recording. It will record with screen off when most other recording apps stop recording when the screen is off
reviews.author: kevin chupe

reviews.title: As advertised
reviews.comment: Simple and efficient. Just what I wanted!
reviews.author: Anastasia Searfoss

reviews.title: Very cool app
reviews.comment: Useful and powerful! Simple to use!

reviews.title: Works like a charm!
reviews.comment: Does the job just fine. No nonsense, easy to use audio recorder. I like the file/compression/quality options. If I ever want to have silences automatically skipped I\'ll definitely get the paid version.
reviews.author: Rogier E

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: I\'ve had no probs and it sounds much more clear than I thought it would
reviews.author: Kyra Correll

reviews.title: Very intrusive
reviews.comment: Why a voice recording app need to modify phone settings? It\'s either bad programming or lame. C\'mon it just records sounds.
reviews.author: Nicola Ferralis

reviews.title: Awzum
reviews.comment: Great app , small file , records great , easy to use shows how loud you are speaking etc. Love it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Jeffery Fowlkes
reviews.comment: I just downloaded and installed easy voice recorder. I tried it out and it is really good and simple. I have a 2 Gig sim card and is able to get 16 hours of continuous recording. I can set it up for lectures or ease dropping. Using Cool Pad. Playback is clear.
reviews.author: Jeffery Fowlkes

reviews.title: Nice app
reviews.comment: Really like it, well constructed, beautiful, soft, fast, simple, good quality control. Nice app, get it.
reviews.author: Fabien B.

reviews.title: Piece of Crap
reviews.comment: This app sucks.............. the audio quality is down-right terrible you can save to an external source but the hissing and sometimes loss of audio is completely lost when played from a PC. whats the point is creating a terrible app. I got a Huawei android phone. I\'m un-installing.
reviews.author: Kevv Frederick

reviews.title: Great for cover song recording
reviews.comment: Is really good for recording songs, and mixing the recording with a backing track using Audacity on my laptop. Before I got Easy Voice Recorder I didn\'t know how loud I could sing without it sounding awful. So Easy Voice Recorder helps me bypass that problem.  I highly recommend it y\'all!
reviews.author: Sammy Readman

reviews.comment: I really like this app. It is what I wanted out of my recording app. It would be cool if there were an option/short cut to email the recording. I really like the app though! When I lost my phone I re-downloaded it and was sad for the loss of my other recordings.
reviews.author: Sugo Wayne

reviews.title: Simple to use
reviews.comment: What happen to the widgets that allows me to record, pause and stop?
reviews.author: Fauzi Abbas

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Great app!! Good for getting some evidence!! Hehehe
reviews.author: Lance Liew

reviews.comment: Great app. But the continuous numbering of files, even if you put a new title, sucks
reviews.author: Marcelino Jr Pe Benito
